content.query:
--Run it from RetailCosmosDB Database

CREATE VIEW RetailSales
AS 
SELECT  *
FROM OPENROWSET (
    'CosmosDB', N'account=cosmoscompass;database=RetailSalesDemoDB;region=West Europe;key=bQphjXxF4Et15WIZT2yN51l47YupBQO7zIMAtYFsW0SBuWCkg24pQf2n6e55EF3OH6B6uANOAWZ8ACDbByZQow==',RetailSales)
AS q1
